description: The driver in France was set upon by people who had no tickets and refused to wear face masks.
title: Bayonne: Bus driver left brain dead after being 'attacked over face masks'
title_page: Bayonne: Bus driver left brain dead after being 'attacked over face masks' - BBC News
maintext: The driver in Bayonne had refused to allow several people - who had no tickets and were not wearing masks - to board the bus on Sunday night, a police source told AFP news agency.
